items.content_html: A lightweight Web3 learning platform combining bite-sized lessons (5-10 mins) with a decentralized currency knowledge hub. Features quick interactive quizzes, practical challenges, and historical data on global currencies with community contributions via DAO governance. Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.

Features quick interactive quizzes, practical challenges, and historical data on global currencies with community contributions via DAO governance. Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.

items.content_html: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript‚Äîmaking it way harder for scrapers to detect.
items.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript‚Äîmaking it way harder for scrapers to detect.

items.content_html: What we created with Cloudflare Worker is a Serverless Function running on Cloudflare's edge network. It acts as a lightweight API proxy that processes requests from the React app, fetches data from the OMDb API, and returns the response. This approach enhances security by hiding the API key and improves performance.
items.title: Christopher-Totlyakov/OnlineMovieAPI: What we created with Cloudflare Worker is a Serverless Function running on Cloudflare's edge network. It acts as a lightweight API proxy that processes requests from the React app, fetches data from the OMDb API, and returns the response. This approach enhances security by hiding the API key and improves performance.

items.content_html: Glyph CMS is a lightweight, API-driven CMS for creating and managing blog content with a rich text editor. It provides structured JSON output, supports images, lists, and links, and offers an optional pre-styled component library for easy integration. üöÄ

items.content_html: This is a simple and classic Snake game built using only HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The game is designed to be lightweight and runs directly in your web browser without the need for any external libraries. It features a snake that grows longer as it eats food and must avoid colliding with the walls .
items.title: Suba0215/SnakeGame: This is a simple and classic Snake game built using only HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The game is designed to be lightweight and runs directly in your web browser without the need for any external libraries. It features a snake that grows longer as it eats food and must avoid colliding with the walls .
